## ‚ö° **DESIGN SPECIFICATIONS**

**PCB Details:**
- **Size**: 250mm x 150mm (compact automotive control board)
- **Layers**: 2-layer with ground plane
- **Components**: 31 parts, all JLCPCB compatible
- **Power**: 12V automotive input ‚Üí 3.3V/5V outputs
- **Control**: ESP32 WiFi/BLE + 5A relay output

**Key Features:**
‚úÖ Automotive-grade power supply (LM2596S buck converter)  
‚úÖ Logic-level MOSFET (IRLZ44N) for 3.3V control  
‚úÖ Reverse polarity protection  
‚úÖ Proper ground plane design  
‚úÖ All JLCPCB parts verified in stock  

## ‚ö†Ô∏è **CRITICAL UNDERSTANDING**

This PCB is a **CONTROL BOARD** that:
- ‚úÖ Provides WiFi/BLE connectivity via ESP32
- ‚úÖ Controls external 100A automotive contactor
- ‚úÖ Handles 12V automotive power safely
- ‚ùå **CANNOT switch 100A directly on PCB**

**For complete 100A switching:**
- Order this control PCB ($150-200)
- Add external automotive contactor ($200-300)
- **Total system cost: $400-500**
